title: System Software Engineer - Apple Vision Pro
summary: Apple Vision Pro is a revolutionary spatial computer that seamlessly blends digital content with physical space. Looking for an exceptional engineer to help architect and implement latency-critical system software.
description: Are you interested in working on spatial computing, augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR) technology? Are you driven by innovation? Are you passionate about creating and delivering ground-breaking products and services? If yes, this role is for you!
key_qualifications: 6+ years of technical experience required. Proficiency in writing production quality C/C++ code. Experience with multi-threaded and multi-process designs, performance analysis and optimization. Deep understanding of operating system fundamentals. Creative and critical thinking capabilities and debugging skills.
education_experience: BS in Computer Science/Computer Engineering or equivalent experience/skills
additional_requirements: While no familiarity with certain technologies is expected, candidates should be eager to learn and innovate in those areas.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay for this role ranges between $175,800 and $312,200 depending on skills, qualifications, experience, and location. Employees have stock ownership opportunities, comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounted products/services, tuition reimbursement, bonuses, and relocation.
